email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Alexander Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexander,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEAN GLORY for a freight quote of USD 22 per ton. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. Laycan dates are flexible, starting from November 15. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 22 per ton seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 20 per ton? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Alexander Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Alexander,

Considering your feedback, we can revise the freight quote to USD 21 per ton. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. The laycan dates remain flexible, starting from November 15. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to USD 21 per ton. Please confirm the laycan dates as November 15-20 and send the contract for review.

Best regards,
Alexander Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Alexander,

Confirmed. The laycan dates are November 15-20, and the freight rate is USD 21 per ton. I will send the contract for your review shortly.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee
